text: The 1988 Swish Scottish Professional Championship was a professional non- ranking snooker tournament, which took place in February 1988 in Edinburgh, Scotland. Stephen Hendry won the title for the third time in a row by beating Murdo MacLeod 10–4 in the final. ==Main draw== ==References== Category:Scottish Professional Championship Scottish Professional Championship Scottish Professional Championship Scottish Professional Championship
title: 1988 Scottish Professional Championship
